misc: Struggles with his gender identity, occasionally participating in events under his female alter-ego, "Eva".
biography: Marcus, a familiar face at Kurk Golf, is set to participate in his twelfth Hector Trophée in 2025. A competitor since the inaugural event, Marcus brings a wealth of experience to the greens.

Known for his strategic play and unwavering determination, Marcus is a formidable opponent in both individual and pair formats. While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his commitment to the sport remains steadfast.

Off the course, Marcus is known for his introspective nature and his exploration of identity. Occasionally, he has been seen participating in events under the guise of his female alter-ego, Eva, showcasing a different facet of his multifaceted personality. Whether as Marcus or Eva, his presence adds a unique dimension to the tournament.
